scripts.setup-env: cd ./env && yarn startTestEnvironment && bash -c 'for i in {1..5}; do echo "Health check attempt $i/5..."; podman exec ntwa-db psql -U noteuser -d notedb -c "SELECT 1" > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ PostgreSQL ready" && exit 0; [ $i -lt 5 ] && sleep 2; done; echo "✗ PostgreSQL health check failed"; exit 1' && cd ../db-migration && yarn migrate
scripts.teardown-env: cd ./db-migration && yarn migrate:undo:all && cd ../env && yarn stopTestEnvironment
